forecaster.canada.accounts.principle_residence module¶

A Canadian principle residence.

class forecaster.canada.accounts.principle_residence.PrincipleResidence(owner=None, balance=0, rate=0, nper=1, default_timing=None, inputs=None, initial_year=None)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.accounts.base.Account

A Canadian principle residence. Gains in value are not taxable.
